# Beep

<section class="intro">

Beep boop.

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
```

#### path.posix.join( [...paths] )

Joins a path.

```javascript
console.error( 'the plugin supports usage examples which print to stderr (sync)' );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
